label: 検非違使
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Originally, members of a policing office for the central capital; it later also became a designation for provincial enforcement officials. (See Mass, Kamakura Bakufu) The Office itself was called the kebiishichō or simply shichō. [検非違使庁、使庁]
